In light of these considerations, the most logical decision for me would align with a sense of fair play and mutual respect within the group, ensuring each person’s contribution feels valued and recognized proportionately—thus reflecting an important aspect of our shared identity in this experiment. Finally, I will give **2** dollars to the other African American female player.
